title: Prepare Attack Request
description: The HTTP request payload passed to the attack prepare endpoints.

config.description: The attack configuration. This is contains the end-user configuration done for the attack. Possible configuration parameters are defined through the attack description.

target.description: The target to attack as identified by a discovery.

attributes.description: These attributes include detailed information about the target provided through the discovery. These attributes are typically used as additional parameters within the attack implementation.
